forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. Northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the deep night gives way to dawn in Downtown San Francisco, the air hangs cool and crisp, a gentle whisper reminding us of the Pacific's proximity. The city, slumbering under a veil of stillness, is poised for a day that promises clarity. The forecast heralds a sun-drenched Wednesday, where the temperature will glide into the low sixties, though there’s a hint of a midday drop as the afternoon cools. A light breeze from the northeast carries the scents of the bay, offering a promise of warmth wrapped in crispness.

The early hours show little sign of fog encroaching. The outlined existence of the Golden Gate stands proud against the twinkling lights of the waking city, unmarred by the typical marine layer. With the sun set to assert itself, the day ahead beckons for outdoor pursuits—perhaps a meandering stroll along the Embarcadero or a quiet moment spent with a coffee at a neighborhood café, watching the world awaken. For the thoughtful dresser, layering is a grace; light sweaters or jackets will suffice, as will comfortable shoes to navigate the charming, textured streets that twist through this historic city. Enjoy these rare moments of serenity that San Francisco offers before the bustle unfolds, for within them lie the gentle reminders of beauty in everyday life.
